features: Review request feature - request Google reviews and Instagram follows for completed events
Fixed admin notifications - all admins and assigned users notified except the person making changes
Improved contact saving - works on web by copying vCard to clipboard, includes event type and date
Dynamic version display - About tab now shows actual version and platform info
Detailed Android download page - restored changelog, features, and version details
bugFixes: Fixed update notification - download URL now uses absolute path
Fixed version display - About tab shows dynamic version instead of hardcoded values
Fixed contact saving on web - gracefully handles platform differences
Fixed admin feature loading delay - improved role check performance
